sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
spurs someone to do something
, nekoga opogumi, da nekaj stori.

seg.quote: Martin's job offer spurred the others to do something themselves.
Companies might spur one another on.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
spurs a change or event
, povzroči, da se neka sprememba ali dogodek zgodi hitreje ali prej.

seg.quote: ...a period of extremely rapid growth, spurred by the advent of the microprocessor.

sense.def:
Tisto, kar učinkuje kot
a spur
, nekoga spodbudi, da nekaj stori, ali povzroči, da se nekaj zgodi hitreje ali prej.

seg.quote: International competition was a spur to modernisation.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
on the spur of the moment
, tisto storimo nenadoma, brez vnaprejšnjega načrtovanja.

seg.quote: I just took the bus on the spur of the moment.

sense.def:
Spurs
so ostre kovinske osti, nataknjene na pete jahalnih škornjev, s katerimi jezdec konja prisili, da gre hitreje.
